product.name: CryptoWill
product.tagline: Simple Crypto Asset Discovery & Will Creation Tool

vision.statement: Create a simple, effective tool that allows cryptocurrency holders to discover their assets across multiple wallets, designate beneficiaries, and generate basic legal documents for asset distribution upon death.
vision.mission: Provide crypto users with an accessible platform to document their digital assets and create simple wills, ensuring their cryptocurrency holdings can be properly inherited by designated beneficiaries.

painPoints: Asset Discovery: Crypto holders often have assets spread across multiple wallets and blockchains
Proof of Ownership: Difficulty proving ownership of wallet addresses for legal purposes
Beneficiary Management: No simple way to designate crypto beneficiaries with proper contact information
Legal Documentation: Lack of simple legal documents specifically for cryptocurrency inheritance
Fair Distribution: Complex percentage calculations for multiple beneficiaries
solution: Multi-blockchain wallet connection and asset discovery
Message signing for proof of ownership
Simple legal document generation and printing

primaryUsers.description: Crypto Holders: Individuals with cryptocurrency assets across multiple wallets
primaryUsers.primaryNeed: Simple asset documentation and inheritance planning

primary: Asset Discovery: Connect and discover assets across multiple blockchain wallets
Ownership Verification: Prove wallet ownership through message signing
Beneficiary Management: Simple beneficiary setup with contact information and ETH addresses
Document Generation: Create printable legal documents for asset distribution
User Experience: Intuitive interface accessible to non-technical users

steps.name: Registration & Login
steps.description: Landing Page: Clear value proposition and call-to-action, Login Options: Social login, wallet connection, or email signup, Onboarding: Brief tutorial explaining the process

steps.name: Wallet Connection
steps.description: Wallet Selection: Choose from supported wallets by blockchain, Connection Process: Standard wallet connection flow, Message Signing: Sign a message to prove ownership, Asset Discovery: Automatic scanning and asset detection

steps.name: Beneficiary Setup
steps.description: Add Beneficiaries: Simple form for beneficiary information, ETH Address Input: Address validation with ENS support, Percentage Allocation: Automatic calculation with manual override, Contact Verification: Optional verification steps

steps.name: Document Generation
steps.description: Review Information: Summary of wallets, assets, and beneficiaries, Generate Document: Create PDF will document, Preview & Print: Review document and print options, Save & Update: Save document and set up update notifications

conclusion.summary: CryptoWill represents a focused solution for cryptocurrency asset discovery and inheritance documentation. This MVP platform provides essential tools for crypto holders to document their assets, designate beneficiaries, and generate simple legal documents for asset distribution.
conclusion.keySuccess: The platform's success will depend on providing a secure, user-friendly interface that makes crypto inheritance planning accessible to everyday users. By focusing on core functionality - wallet connection, asset discovery, beneficiary management, and document generation - we can deliver immediate value while building a foundation for future enhancements.
